page.title: 15EDUCATION:CHERRY WILLINGHAM
page.content: Education in Cherry Willingam and Reepham comprises of a Comprehensive school with 480 pupils in it and it is fed by schools from within and outside our block. Within the block there is a school at Reepham which has about 100 pupils from 5yrs to 11yrs. The school is old (built about 1890) and has some temporary buildings. Cherry Willingham has two other schools; an infant and a junior school.The two schools have about 180 pupils. A major problem for this area is that the population has dropped a lot over the last few years and it is supposed to continue for the immediate future. At the present time there is a county group looking into the best way to provide education for the area which includes this block. V.HOOD,R.FOX
